thumb.title: 【作業用BGM】ラウンジbarの片隅で 4 -Old Parr- 【Jazz】
thumb.description: 久方ぶりに、当シリーズの新作です。今回はオールドジャズに特化して選りすぐってみました♪-Song List-1. Are You Real? (Junior Cook)2. The Real Mccoy (Ronnell Bright)3. Like Someone in Love (René Thomas)4. Porky (Nat Adderley)5. I May Be Wrong (But I Think You're Wonderful) (Frank Rosolino)6. April love (Teddy Edwards) 7. Mellow Mood (Dodo Marmarosa)8. Walkie Talkie (Conte Candoli)9. Just a Memory (Duke Ellington & Johnny Hodges)10. 9:20 Special (Dempsey Wright) 11. Aw C'mon Hoss (Dick Johnson Quartet）12. R and R Groove (Ronnell Bright Trio)13. Light Blue (Horace Parlan)14. A Song for Richard (Joe Gordon)15. Young Soul (Dwike Mitchell)16. Lid Flippin' (Johnny Smith & Lem Winchester)17. Foolin' Myself (Art Pepper & Ted Brown)18. Too-Ra-Roo-Ra-Loo-Ra (Ruby Braff)19. Thanks For The Memory (Serge Chaloff)
